text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-RoleClassContent

Language: en

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a CONT

name: RoleClassContent
title: RoleClassContent
description: Relates a material as the content (player) to a container (scoper). Unlike ingredients, the content and a container remain separate (not mixed) and the content can be removed from the container. A content is not part of an empty container.
